divs: Sighting DetailsThis will be the third sighting I've had in this area in under a year. I was looking up into the sky while assisting my husband while he worked on our neighbors roof. I was watching him on the roof when I spotted a reddish metallic orb fly over. My initial reaction was it's just a mylar balloon. As it flew overhead I noticed the orb's path was very straight, and was flying through the strong western wind we had that day. I got excited and shouted up to my husband to look up, I ran over to the side of the house he was on and shouted, "Look up, Look up!" I watched it until the treeline blocked my view of the sky. When my husband got down form the ladder he asked me what I was shouting about and when I told him he was upset that he missed another sighting in our own backyard.
Summary: Reddish orb moving across strong wind.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Kingston
There were no other sightings in Kingston on or around July 4th 2009
